Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:

::Both of the Maximals got out of CR chambers::
"Well, that was re-AGH!" (Stinkbomb yelled, slamming through the glass of a 
cr chamber and hitting his head, Ramhorn just hitting the ground)

"Slag!" (Ramhorn activated his com)
<Iron Raptor, I think you're in charge, it seems we're under heavy attack.  I 
don't know the amount of damage done, but Stinkbomb and myself will check it 
out.  Since we don't really know each other, I'm Ramhorn just to let you 
know> (he ended his transmission)

::Both of the Maximals ran towards to the doors of the Ark::
